snippet.title: Never Alone 2 Teaser Trailer | Humble Games
snippet.description:
Head to Steam to wishlist Never Alone 2: https://bit.ly/3vGc4zh

ABOUT NEVER ALONE 2
Developed by E-Line Media and published by Humble Games, Never Alone 2 is the upcoming 3D sequel to the BAFTA award-winning adventure drawn from the Iñupiaq storytelling tradition. Journey through the breathtaking Alaska wilderness as Nuna and Fox, her spirit companion, along the way unearthing an epic mystery that threatens your entire community.

--------------------------------------------------------------
Follow Humble Games: 
Twitter: https://bit.ly/HumbleGames_TW 
Instagram: https://bit.ly/HumbleGames_IG 
Facebook: https://bit.ly/HumbleGames_FB
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/humble
